name: Thomas B Bennett
bio: When Thomas B. Bennett was born in 1803, in Kentucky, United States, his father, William F Bennett, was 31 and his mother, Harriet Shipp, was 24. He married Prudence Shipp on 3 April 1828, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 7 sons and 7 daughters. He lived in Election Precinct 14 Georgiana, Butler, Alabama, United States in 1860. He died on 2 February 1878, in Butler, Alabama, United States, at the age of 75.
